reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro LED+ Dual Dimmer and Switch | 75-Watt LED Bulbs/2.5A Fans, Single-Pole | MACL-L3S25-WH | White
reviews.text: I live in a house built in the ‘40s with only some minor upgrades. I have a ceiling fan and three light fixtures controlled by a dual single gang switch. I had three LEDs in the fixtures for over 10 years. They were 60w equivalent and I usually found the light to be too dim, but I didn’t want constant glaringly bright light. This switch seemed like the perfect solution. It looked like an easy project, so I devoted time on Sunday to knock it out. I got everything hooked up per the instructions and nothing would work. The LEDs just blinked and the ceiling fan wouldn’t turn off. I researched online and only got more confused until I decided to take a chance and see if Lutron support was open on Sunday. They were! I explained my whole installation process and what was happening. I mentioned that I had old bulbs still in place because I wanted to get the switch working before I broke out the ladder to replace the bulbs. The agent told me that the bulbs were probably the culprit. (It didn’t make sense to me that the ceiling fan switch wouldn’t work either), but I changed the bulbs and the problem was solved! Even though I think about switches as being two separate circuits, there are internal electronics in these modern switches that are effected by each other. I’ve got a great new switch and I learned something new!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2025
reviews.title: Great product with even better customer service!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro LED+ Dual Dimmer and Switch | 75-Watt LED Bulbs/2.5A Fans, Single-Pole | MACL-L3S25-WH | White
reviews.text: Amazing! Expensive compared to other switches, but the only way I’ve found to dim my vanity light and control my fan in the same switch. Had an electrician install since I had one doing work already and he said it was super easy.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro LED+ Dual Dimmer and Switch | 75-Watt LED Bulbs/2.5A Fans, Single-Pole | MACL-L3S25-WH | White
reviews.text: The top button is a dimmer. You can set the dim level and 1 press turns the light on to that setting. A double tap turn the light all the way on. A tap when it is on dims it down to off. The bottom button controls a second light and is not a dimmer. It works great and corrected my error of only installing one box in the vanity room of the bathroom.

reviews.title: Pretty great

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro LED+ Dual Dimmer and Switch | 75-Watt LED Bulbs/2.5A Fans, Single-Pole | MACL-L3S25-WH | White
reviews.text: This is the only device on the market with a LED dimmer on top and a separate single pole switch on the bottom on a single yoke, way overpriced for what it is, but it does solve a problem. This device is extremely deep and wide with the heat sinks so beware when you’re installing. Do you need extra deep the box or it won’t work.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2024
reviews.title: The only device on the market like this

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro LED+ Dual Dimmer and Switch | 75-Watt LED Bulbs/2.5A Fans, Single-Pole | MACL-L3S25-WH | White
reviews.text: This was easy to install and it works well. I separated my porch lights so that the recessed lights in the ceiling of the porch is connected to the dimmer and the switch is connected to the door/wall light. The cost was definitely a bit of a shock but there aren't many dimmer/switch products available with this configuration. Cost was the only reason I deducted a star from the overall rating of this product. Make sure you visit the Lutron support site to get detailed installation and programming instructions. The printed instructions that come in the package doesn't provide all the information and may be needed.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024
reviews.title: Works as advertised but it's pricy
